description:
Job Summary

We are looking for an experienced Automation Systems Engineer to design, implement, and maintain industrial automation solutions. The ideal candidate will have expertise in PLC programming, SCADA/DCS systems, and industrial control processes. This role requires hands-on experience with automation technologies, problem-solving skills, and the ability to optimize systems for efficiency, reliability, and safety.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design & Development: Integrate automation systems with existing industrial networks and ensure seamless communication between components.
  • System Integration: Develop and implement PLC, HMI, and SCADA/DCS solutions for industrial automation projects.
  • Testing & Troubleshooting: Conduct system testing, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure optimal performance.
  • Documentation: Create and maintain detailed technical documentation, including wiring diagrams, system schematics, and user manuals.

Why Join Us?

  • Work on cutting-edge automation projects that drive innovation in industrial operations.
  • Collaborate with a team of skilled engineers in a dynamic and challenging environment.
  • Competitive salary, benefits, and opportunities for career growth and professional development.
